sentences.en: “If I don't pan out as an actor I can still go back to school”(&b{Saul Bellow})
sentences.cn: “如果我不能胜任做一名医生，我仍能够回到学校”(&b{索尔·贝洛})

sentences.en: a cake pan
sentences.cn: 蛋糕烤盘

sentences.en: a frying pan
sentences.cn: 炒锅

sentences.en: A pan rattled and clanked.
sentences.cn: 平底锅叮叮咣咣地响。

sentences.en: Brown the mince in a frying pan.
sentences.cn: 在煎锅里把肉末煎至棕色。

sentences.en: communities crumble, hospitals are shut, and the economy goes down the pan.
sentences.cn: 社区崩溃了，医院关闭了，经济一蹶不振。

sentences.en: Cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling water.
sentences.cn: 把意大利面放在一大锅开水里煮。

sentences.en: Empty the contents of the pan into the sieve.
sentences.cn: 将锅里的东西倒到筛子上。

sentences.en: Grate a tablespoonful of fresh ginger into a pan.
sentences.cn: 磨碎一汤匙鲜姜，放入平底锅。

sentences.en: He browned the chicken in a frying pan.
sentences.cn: 他用煎锅把鸡肉煎成焦黄色。

sentences.en: He hit her with a frying pan during a drunken brawl.
sentences.cn: 他酒后耍酒疯用平底锅打了她。

sentences.en: Once, she walloped me over the head with a frying pan.
sentences.cn: 有一次，她用煎锅狠狠地砸了我的头。

sentences.en: pots and pans
sentences.cn: 锅碗瓢盆

sentences.en: Put a pan of salted water on to boil.
sentences.cn: 将一锅盐水放上去煮。

sentences.en: Put the onions in the pan and cook until lightly browned.
sentences.cn: 将洋葱放入平底锅内，炒至略呈棕色。

sentences.en: Put the sugar and water in a heavy pan and heat slowly.
sentences.cn: 将糖和水放在一只厚底锅里慢慢加热。

sentences.en: Shake off any excess flour before putting livers in the pan.
sentences.cn: 将多余的面粉抖落干净，再把肝脏放进锅中。

sentences.en: Slowly a thick layer of fat builds up on the pan's surface.
sentences.cn: 慢慢地，平底锅表面积起了一层厚厚的油脂。

sentences.en: Sprinkle the meat with salt and place in the pan.
sentences.cn: 在肉上撒上盐，然后放进平底锅。

sentences.en: Strain the stock and put it back into the pan.
sentences.cn: 滤出原汁，将它放回到平底锅中。

sentences.en: The movie was panned by the critics.
sentences.cn: 那部电影遭到了评论家的猛烈批评。

sentences.en: The ridged design of the pan allows excess fat to drain off.
sentences.cn: 平底锅的凸纹设计使多余的油能够控出。

phrases.tran_cn: 蛋糕烘模；蛋糕烤盘；盛蛋糕的铁制容器
昙花一现（指开始预料取得重大成功，结果失败）；淘金盆里的反光（形容空欢喜一场，好景不长）
[美国俚语]受责难；受严厉批评
abbr. 泛美航空公司（Pan American World Airways）
泛美运动会（是南北美洲四年一度的最大型的运动盛事）
全景与扫描（一种缩小宽银幕电影的纵横比以适合电视机方形屏幕的技术，方法是不断地选取原图像中最有效的部分，而不仅是中间部分）
盘头；平头；全景摇摄云台
n. 彼得·潘（天真的成年人）

trans.tran_cn: 平底锅，盘状的器皿，淘盘子，金盘，秤盘
trans.tran_en: a round metal container that you use for cooking, usually with one long handle and a lid
to strongly criticize a film, play etc in a newspaper or on television or radio

trans.tran_cn: 淘金，在淘洗中收获金子
淘金，在浅锅中烹调（食物），[非正式用语]严厉的批评
